name: Delve The Deepest
description:
Try to go as far as you can and reach the highest floor you can! A roguelike card game that is *Mostly* finished. Made for the 2023 7DRL Game Jam. 

Enemy sprites made by Admurin - itch.io/profile/admurin

Pixel art font made by PixelMush - twitter.com/pixelmush

Grid Tileset made by 0x72 - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Battle Tileset made Genewheel - https://genewheel.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
